metadata.name: AVATAR ALL IN
metadata.description: The new NFT project of Floyd Mayweather. There will be a supply of 5,000 Mayweverse NFTs (1,000 cards of 5 different types) 5 lucky holders of each card type will receive cash prizes ranging from $5,000 to $30,000! On top of that, there will be the possibility to join FLOYD in the Metaverse through a pass for exclusive occasions & events. Different rarities will provide unique utilities and prizes to their holders
